revised_title: Flocculation of Colloids by Salts Containing Univalent Organic Ions
tldr: This study investigates the flocculation of colloids by salts containing univalent organic ions, focusing on the relationship between surface tension of salt solutions and their capacity for flocculating colloids. The results show that salts with lower surface tensions exhibit greater flocculating power, suggesting that flocculation may be related to an adsorption process.
